title: Logistics Companies Move to Snatch Up Supply-Chain Tech Startups
sub_head: Fueled by an influx of venture capital and strategic shifts, supply-chain startups are in high demand
body:
Logistics behemoths and startups alike are planning for another year of snatching up supply-chain technology companies.
For the past two years, as global supply-chain woes took hold, legacy shipping companies and well-capitalized startups fueled by venture dollars have pushed up the value of merger-and-acquisition activity for young companies offering logistics-related software and hardware. This year, the stock market rout that has cooled valuations for some private companies has created a more favorable acquisition market,...
